XenotypeDef.label: Force Sensitive
XenotypeDef.description: Force Sensitives were sentient or non-sentient lifeforms that possessed a strong connection to the mystical energy field known as the Force

XenotypeDef.label: Corrupted Force Sensitive
XenotypeDef.description: Force Sensitives were sentient or non-sentient lifeforms that possessed a strong connection to the mystical energy field known as the Force, however this person has started to be corrupted by the darkside of the force.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Connection to the Darkside of the Force
